mapper.select: select d.draw_id as draw_id, d.draw_title as draw_title, d.product_id as product_id, d.draw_regdate as draw_regdate, d.draw_event_start_date as draw_event_start_date, d.draw_event_end_date as draw_event_end_date, d.draw_comment as draw_comment, d.draw_reqruit as draw_reqruit, d.draw_close as draw_close, p.product_name as product_name, p.product_price as product_price, p.product_img_url1 as product_img_url1 from t_draw_remake d inner join t_product p on d.product_id = p.product_id where d.draw_id = #{draw_id} order by d.draw_regdate desc

select d.draw_id as draw_id, d.draw_title as draw_title, d.product_id as product_id, d.draw_regdate as draw_regdate, d.draw_event_start_date as draw_event_start_date, d.draw_event_end_date as draw_event_end_date, d.draw_comment as draw_comment, d.draw_reqruit as draw_reqruit, d.draw_close as draw_close, p.product_name as product_name, p.product_price as product_price, p.product_img_url1 as product_img_url1 from t_draw_remake d inner join t_product p on d.product_id = p.product_id order by d.draw_regdate desc
select draw_enter_id, draw_id, draw_enter_regdate, member_id, draw_winning from t_draw_enter_remake where draw_id = #{draw_id} order by draw_enter_regdate asc

select e.draw_id as draw_id, d.draw_reqruit as draw_reqruit, (select count(*) from t_draw_enter_remake where draw_id = #{draw_id} and draw_winning = 'y') as draw_winning, (select count(*) from t_draw_enter_remake where draw_id = #{draw_id}) as application from t_draw_enter_remake e inner join t_draw_remake d on e.draw_id = d.draw_id where e.draw_id = #{draw_id} group by e.draw_id
mapper.update: update t_draw_remake set draw_title = #{draw_title}, draw_reqruit = #{draw_reqruit}, draw_event_start_date = #{draw_event_start_date}, draw_event_end_date = #{draw_event_end_date}, draw_comment = #{draw_comment} where draw_id = #{draw_id}
